wordGroup: sesame seed 芝麻籽，芝麻种子
black sesame 黑芝麻；黑麻点
sesame street 芝麻街（幼儿教育电视节目）
sesame paste 芝麻酱，芝麻糊
open sesame 开门咒；成功的诀窍

sentences.en: Even Sesame Street can get serious.
sentences.cn: 即使是《芝麻街》也可以很严肃。

sentences.en: A regular McDonald's sesame-seed bun contains calcium propionate and sodium propionate—both preservatives.
sentences.cn: 普通的麦当劳芝麻小圆面包含有丙酸钙和丙酸钠，这两样都是防腐剂。

sentences.en: Sweet dumpling is small dumpling balls made of glutinous rice flour with rose petals, sesame, walnut meat, dried fruit, sugar.
sentences.cn: 汤圆是用糯米粉做皮，由玫瑰花瓣、芝麻、豆酱、枣泥、胡桃肉、干果、糖和食用油做馅，做成的小面球团。
